references.reason: This paper is foundational for diffusion models, introducing the core concepts and methods that underpin many subsequent advancements in the field.

references.paper_title: Score-Based Generative Modeling Through Stochastic Differential Equations
references.reason: This paper significantly improves the efficiency of diffusion models by introducing the use of stochastic differential equations, enabling faster and more stable generation of high-quality samples.

references.paper_title: High-Resolution Image Synthesis with Latent Diffusion Models
references.reason: This paper introduces a highly influential latent diffusion model architecture, providing a crucial stepping stone for advancements in image generation quality and efficiency.
This paper offers a refined approach to diffusion models by introducing implicit models, leading to improvements in sample quality and computational efficiency.

references.paper_title: DPM-Solver: A Fast ODE Solver for Diffusion Probabilistic Model Sampling in Around 10 Steps
references.reason: This paper presents a novel ODE solver that greatly accelerates the sampling process in diffusion models, making them significantly more practical for real-world applications.
